oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stamps Quartet - American Beauty Flour #02
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Stamps Quartet radio program #02 sponsored by American Beauty Flour, with songs from their World Wide Church songbook. Featuring Roy George (announcer), Frank Stamps (host, performer), Bob Arnold (performer), and Bob Bacon (performer). This disc was originally broadcast by KWHI, Brenham, Texas, possibly also recorded at this station (unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Stamps Quartet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: American Beauty Flour jingle -- Opening statement (Roy George) -- Opening statement (Frank Stamps) -- Only One Savior -- American Beauty Flour commercial -- The Old Gospel Ship -- Frank Stamps talks -- Hide Me, Rock Of Ages -- Frank Stamps talks -- The Gloryland Way -- Closing statements -- American Beauty Flour jingle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KWHI (Radio station : Benham, Tex.); Stamps Quartet; Stamps, Frank H., 1896-1965; Arnold, Robert E., 1900-; Bacon, Bob (Singer)
